entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR
PATCHY FOG THIS MORNING
HOT WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 90S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
LOWS AROUND 60

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
